entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 09:46 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
